Class PowerUp

    public abstract class PowerUp
extends Square
    Abstract class. This class represents the notion of the game power up items.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PowerUp

        public PowerUp(java.lang.String symbol,
               int row,
               int col)
        The constructor method to create a power up item.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the string symbol of the item, such as: D for radar detection, B for bullet...
        row - a number from 0-8, for array position
        col - a number from 0-8, for array position
